name: Trials 64 (Banres)
description:
This is the full version of my game made for the Retro Jam. If you want to play the Jam version, you can find it here!

Trials 64 is a game inspired by the Trials series, but designed to look like it came out on a N64 console! 

I'll be adding to the game as I go, with more levels and additions on the way.

Controls: W/S Drive A/D Lean Escape Return to menu SpaceLoad "pause" menu
